Pre-Game Insights: Washington Wizards (2-7, 13th in the Eastern Conference) vs. San Antonio Spurs (5-6, 12th in the Western Conference)
San Antonio went 22-60 overall with a 12-29 record at home during the 2023-24 season. The Spurs gave up 118.6 points per game while committing 17.2 fouls last season.
Washington finished 15-67 overall with an 8-33 record on the road a season ago. The Wizards shot 47.0% from the field and 34.8% from 3-point range last season.

INJURIES: Spurs: Malaki Branham: day to day (ankle), Tre Jones: out (ankle), Jeremy Sochan: out (thumb). Wizards: Saddiq Bey: out (knee), Malcolm Brogdon: out (thumb), Richaun Holmes: day to day (illness).
